resources.string: This email confirms that SMS forwarding is working on your device!
Internet connectivity was not detected. Connect to the Internet and try again.
This app needs access to your Google account and your received SMSes.
This app requires Google Play Services.
Please install Google Play Services on your device and relaunch this app.
SMS forwarding is now enabled for the account \'%s\'.
SMS forwarding is not currently enabled. Tap \'%s\' to begin.
